page.description: Returns the contents of a file as a text string.

argument.name: filename
argument.description: The fully qualified name of a file.

page.discussion: GET_FROM_FILE() opens a file specified by filename and reads the contents of the file. Returns a character string with the contents of the file. This high level command is easier than using the low level FILE.OPEN()and <FILE>.READ()methods.

section.description: This script sets the value in a variable to the contents of a text file.
section.example: dim text1 as C Filename = "f:\a5\test2.txt" Text1 = get_from_file(filename)
